name: Sarah's Hot Cocoa
recipe:
My favorite reading treat is a rich hot cocoa made with:

• 2 cups whole milk
• 3 tbsp cocoa powder
• 2 tbsp sugar
• 1/4 tsp vanilla extract
• Pinch of salt
• Whipped cream on top

Heat milk in a saucepan, whisk in cocoa and sugar until smooth. Add vanilla and salt. Top with whipped cream and enjoy with your favorite chapter!

name: Classic Gingerbread Cookies
recipe:
These gingerbread cookies are perfect for reading on a cozy afternoon:

Ingredients:
• 3 cups flour
• 1 tsp baking soda
• 2 tsp ground ginger
• 1 tsp cinnamon
• 1/2 tsp cloves
• 1/4 tsp salt
• 3/4 cup butter, softened
• 3/4 cup brown sugar
• 1/2 cup molasses
• 1 egg

Instructions:
1. Mix dry ingredients
2. Cream butter and sugar, add molasses and egg
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients
4. Chill dough for 1 hour
5. Roll out and cut shapes
6. Bake at 350°F for 8-10 minutes

name: Spiced Chai Latte
recipe:
My go-to drink while reading:

• 2 cups water
• 4 black tea bags
• 2 cinnamon sticks
• 4 cardamom pods
• 4 whole cloves
• 1-inch fresh ginger, sliced
• 2 cups milk
• Honey to taste

Boil water with spices for 5 minutes. Add tea bags, steep for 3 minutes. Add milk and heat (don't boil). Strain and sweeten with honey. Perfect for curling up with a good book!
